seer.name: Seer
seer.description: Can see the true identity of one player each night

town_guard.name: Town Guard
town_guard.description: Protects a player each night from being eliminated.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Can eliminate one player when they are eliminated

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: Has a poison and a potion that can be used to save a player or eliminate a player

priest.name: The Priest
priest.description: He can spray a player with holy water. If that player is a werewolf, he will be eliminated

detective.name: The Detective
detective.description: Can investigate two players each night to see if they are on the same team

thief.name: The Thief
thief.description: Can switch his identity with another player once during the game

judge.name: The Judge
judge.description: Can invoke the voting of the players once during the game, the player who is voted out will not be eliminated

crow.name: The Crow
crow.description: He chooses a player, during the voting that player will hold two votes

elder.name: The Elder
elder.description: If eliminated by the villagers, the villagers' actions will be cancelled

patient.name: The Patient
patient.description: If eliminated by the werewolves, the werewolves will lose their night actions. If the villagers voted him out, the werewolves will kill twice

scapegoat.name: Scapegoat
scapegoat.description: He can choose to be eliminated instead of another player

bigBadWolf.name: The Big Bad Wolf
bigBadWolf.description: He is the werewolf leader, he can choose to eliminate one player each night, and can choose to change a werewolf with a villager (the werewolf will be eliminated)

wolfCub.name: The Wolf Cub
wolfCub.description: When eliminated by the villagers, the werewolves will kill one more player

seerWerewolf.name: The Seer Werewolf
seerWerewolf.description: He can reveal the true identity of one player once per game

whiteWerewolf.name: The White Werewolf
whiteWerewolf.description: Lone wolf, he can kill a werewolf each two nights, he only wins if he is the only werewolf surviving

drunk.name: The Drunk
drunk.description: Loner Role, when he is eliminated by the villagers, he alone will win the game

cupid.name: Cupid
cupid.description: In the first night he can choose two players to fall in love, if one of those players is eliminated the other player will be eliminated too, Cupid will only win when the two players are the only ones surviving
